name: part_018
file: tmp_【#ひろがるホロライブDAY2】hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade hololive stage DAY2【チラ見せ】 [lZGqBUSvF4s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_018.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki and Usada Pekora interact with the audience, performing a call-and-response session about how much the fans love them.
Fubuki and Pekora share their feelings after their solo performances and express gratitude to the audience for their calls.
The idols announce the official hashtag for the event and encourage fans to share screenshots on social media.
Announcement of the end of the free viewing part on YouTube and a final synchronized shout to wrap up the segment.
End card showing event information and thanking viewers.

subtitles.original: こんこんこんこん！ヘイ、ビートちゃん！
subtitles.english: Kon kon kon kon! Hey, Beat-chan!

subtitles.original: これからあれ、使っていいってことですからね、すないぺ。
subtitles.english: From now on, we can use that, you know? Snai-pe!

subtitles.original: え、本当に？こんこんこんこんいいんぺこ？
subtitles.english: Wait, really? Is "Kon kon kon kon" okay, peko?

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃいいと思うぺこよ。
subtitles.english: I think it's perfectly fine, peko.

subtitles.original: やったー！こんこんこんこん！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Kon kon kon kon! Yay!

subtitles.original: マジで？はい。
subtitles.english: For real? Yes.

subtitles.original: お、何で？フブキちゃん。
subtitles.english: Oh, what's up, Fubuki-chan?

subtitles.original: ぺこらもさ、やりたいのがあの、フブキちゃんのさ…
subtitles.english: Pekora also wants to do that thing of Fubuki-chan's...

subtitles.original: …何百回愛してるみたいな。
subtitles.english: ...like the "I love you hundreds of times" thing.

subtitles.original: あー、あれをぺこらもやりたいのぺこ、フブキちゃん。
subtitles.english: Ah, Pekora also wants to do that, Fubuki-chan.

subtitles.original: やりたい？やりたい？やりたい？
subtitles.english: You want to? You want to? You want to?

subtitles.original: やりたい、やりたい、やりたいぺこ！
subtitles.english: I want to, I want to, I want to, peko!

subtitles.original: じゃあ白上がお手本見せますね。
subtitles.english: Then Shirakami will show you how it's done.

subtitles.original: じゃあ白上が「白上のこと何万回好き？」って言ったら
subtitles.english:
So when Shirakami asks, "How many million times
do you like Shirakami?"

subtitles.original: 皆さん答えるの分かりますよね？
subtitles.english: You all know how to answer, right?

subtitles.original: 分かるぺこ。
subtitles.english: We know, peko!

subtitles.original: 言ってください、出来ますよ。
subtitles.english: Go ahead, we can do it.

subtitles.original: 白上のこと何万回好き？
subtitles.english: How many million times do you like Shirakami?

subtitles.original: 100万回愛してるよ！
subtitles.english: We love you a million times!

subtitles.original: あーー！やったーー！良かったー、良かった。
subtitles.english: Ahhh! Yay! Good, that was great.

subtitles.original: 「好き」って言ったのにね、ちゃんと「愛してる」って返してくれるんですよ。
subtitles.english:
Even though I said "like," they properly
responded with "love."

subtitles.original: じゃあぺこらもそれ答えてくれるのかな？
subtitles.english: Then, will they answer the same for Pekora?

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと答えるしかないな。準備！
subtitles.english: Ah, we have no choice but to answer. Ready!

subtitles.original: おし！準備よし！
subtitles.english: Alright! Ready!

subtitles.original: 準備よしとしてくれてる。
subtitles.english: They're getting ready.

subtitles.original: フブキちゃんお願いします。
subtitles.english: Fubuki-chan, if you please.

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: じゃあみんなも準備いいぺこだね？
subtitles.english: Then is everyone ready, peko?

subtitles.original: ぺこらのこと何万回好き？
subtitles.english: How many million times do you like Pekora?

subtitles.original: 100万回愛してるよ！
subtitles.english: We love you a million times!

subtitles.original: いよっしゃー！ありがとう！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Alright! Thank you! Yay!

subtitles.original: いや、いいねやっぱね、声が出せるってね。
subtitles.english: Man, it's great after all, being able to shout.

subtitles.original: 本当に、気持ちいい！最高！
subtitles.english: Really, it feels so good! The best!

subtitles.original: 最高、最高ですよ。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: It's the best, the best. Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: ありがとうみんな！
subtitles.english: Thank you, everyone!

subtitles.original: さてさて、まず1曲ソロでね、終わりましたけども。
subtitles.english: Well then, our first solo songs have ended.

subtitles.original: 改めて歌ってみてどうでした？
subtitles.english: How did it feel singing them just now?

subtitles.original: いやぺこらはもう、満身創痍というか。
subtitles.english: Well, Pekora is just completely exhausted.

subtitles.original: いや本当に。なんか、でもみんなが目の前にいてね…
subtitles.english: No, really. Like, seeing everyone right in front of me...

subtitles.original: こうやって「ハイ！ハイ！」とかやってくれたりしながらもう…
subtitles.english: ...while they were doing the "Hai! Hai!" calls...

subtitles.original: 感動だし緊張もあったぺこだけど。
subtitles.english: I was moved, and also nervous, peko.

subtitles.original: なんかもう、楽しい、本当に楽しい！みんなありがとうね今日本当に。
subtitles.english:
But it's just so fun, really fun! Thank you
all so much for today.

subtitles.original: まだまだこれからだけどね！
subtitles.english: There's still more to come, though!

subtitles.original: そうだね、まだまだこれからだけどね！
subtitles.english: Right, there's still plenty more to come!

subtitles.original: 白上もみんなのコールちゃんと聞こえてたぞ！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Shirakami could clearly hear everyone's calls! Thank you!

subtitles.original: フブキちゃん、フブキちゃんは？
subtitles.english: Fubuki-chan, how about you, Fubuki-chan?

subtitles.original: え、もう本当に楽しかった。トップバッターだったんだけど交代…
subtitles.english:
Oh, it was really fun. I was the top batter,
but since the switch...

subtitles.original: そうだったよね！
subtitles.english: That's right!

subtitles.original: そう！なんかね、スーパー白上タイムとかいって。
subtitles.english: Yeah! Like, having that "Super Shirakami Time."

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、みんな「はにゃあ」ってなってたかもしれないんですけど。
subtitles.english:
I was a bit worried everyone might have been
confused, though.

subtitles.original: いや、白上タイムぺこだったよ！
subtitles.english: No, it was a total Shirakami Time, peko!

subtitles.original: あー、本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you so much!

subtitles.original: さてさて、今回のハッシュタグなんですけど皆さん分かってますよね？
subtitles.english:
Well then, you all know the hashtag
for this time, right?

subtitles.original: 分かってるぺこでしょ！
subtitles.english: They definitely know, peko!

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグ、#ひろがるホロライブDAY2 です！
subtitles.english: The hashtag is #HirogaruHololiveDAY2!

subtitles.original: こちらいっぱい呟いてください！お願いします！
subtitles.english: Please tweet using it a lot! We're counting on you!

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひ、スクショも！
subtitles.english: And screenshots too, please!

subtitles.original: あ、そうだぺこ、うさぺこのね、スクショもぜひぜひ！
subtitles.english:
Oh, right peko, take lots of screenshots
of Usapeko too!

subtitles.original: お願いします！お願いします！
subtitles.english: Please do! Please do!

subtitles.original: そしてなんと悲しいお知らせです。
subtitles.english: And now, we have some sad news.

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: YouTubeでご覧の皆様はここまでとなります。
subtitles.english: This is the end for those watching on YouTube.

subtitles.original: えーーー！
subtitles.english: Ehhhh!

subtitles.original: まだまだね、一緒にみんなで盛り上がっていきたいので…
subtitles.english:
We still want to keep the excitement going
together with everyone...

subtitles.original: ぜひ概要欄から配信サイトへ！
subtitles.english:
So please head to the streaming site
via the description!

subtitles.original: よろぺこ！チケットもよろぺこ！
subtitles.english: Please do, peko! Get your tickets too, peko!

subtitles.original: ということでまだまだね、これから盛り上がっていきますので。
subtitles.english:
And so, things are only going to get
more exciting from here.

subtitles.original: 締めの言葉いきますか？
subtitles.english: Shall we do the closing words?

subtitles.original: いきましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's do it!

subtitles.original: せーの！ひろがる…ホロライブ！
subtitles.english: One, two! Hirogaru... Hololive!

subtitles.original: 無料パートは終了いたしました！
subtitles.english: The free viewing part has ended!

subtitles.original: ご視聴ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you for watching!
